1.0.name: wordpress/tw-anywhere
1.0.description: This plug-in is Twitter "@Anywhere" API and "Topsy" API using. Visitor's twitter account can be attested putting up connected button to the blog entry. After it attests it, link and blog owner's following buttons and blog owner's twitter profile can be displayed. Furthermore, the visitor takes side with the page by visitor's account and it is possible to contribute. It is default and there are url on the page and blog owner's twitter account. As a result, my account and blog URL will flow out on twitter, and the conversation extends.
